fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Choose a player with at least 2 cards in their hand. Both of you must choose simply a non-<:wild:1106237191388143838>card. The cards, once chosen, will be revealed publicly and simultaneously. If they can be played on top of one another both ways, both of you may discard two cards down to a minimum of 1. If not, the cards return to your hands. Cards with disguises act like their disguises.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:cyan:1106716163184009277> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> ):
fields.value: This card can be played out of turn order.
